column1: '''Sagroth''' was one of the guards that [[Hardang]], the [[Halad
column2: Warden of Brethil]], had assigned to keep watch at the [[Haudh-en-Elleth]].  He was the first to spot the sleeping [[Húrin]]  when he had come to that place.  A fellow guard, [[Forhend]], said that Sagroth could be trusted to always find trouble, for he knew that Hardang would not be pleased with the discovery of Húrin within Brethil. <ref>{{WJ
